DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo-controlled , comparative , prospective study ( clinical evaluation ) effectiveness safety dietary supplement Potensa men mild moderate erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Effectiveness Safety Dietary Supplement Potensa Men With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Men , 18 year age old ; Patients diagnose `` erectile dysfunction '' various pathogenesis , typical form without complication ; Ability read understand inform consent order participate study ; Ability follow study 's condition . Oncological illness , except complete remission least 5 year ; Conditions may require emergency plan hospitalization next 6 month ; Extragenital endocrine condition ( hormonally active ) ( thyroid , adrenal gland , pituitary , hypothalamus ) ; Surgeries sex organ within 1 year screening ; Any surgery within 3 month screen ; Psychiatric illnesses ; Diabetes mellitus ; Cryptorchidism Taking dietary supplement affect erectile dysfunction within 1 month participate study ; High risk noncompliance .
